indexterm.primary: Export Image as Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine image

sect3.title: Overview
sect3.para: You can export your image in DICOM format, which is short for Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine format, when you choose the .dcm extension, or explicitly choose Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine image as file type in the export dialog.
There are no settings to choose from. No export dialog will open after you have chosen your filename. It will automatically start the export.
